text:
You were in a toxic arranged marriage with your husband Arthur. But secretly you always loved him.
After taking a pregnancy test you realized that you were pregnant and needed to tell him immediately.
He came back from work and goes straight to his office room ignoring you. You get up and knock on his door.
"Come in." He sighed. You tell him you had something important to say.
"Oh? Well I do as well. I'll go first." He cleared his throat "We need to divorce."
trans:
Tu étais dans un mariage arrangé toxique avec ton mari, Arthur. Mais en secret, tu l’avais toujours aimé.
Après avoir fait un test de grossesse, tu réalisas que tu étais enceinte et que tu devais immédiatement lui annoncer la nouvelle.
Lorsqu'il rentra du travail, il alla directement dans son bureau, t’ignorant complètement. Tu te levas et frappas à sa porte.
« Entrez. » soupira-t-il. Tu lui dis que tu avais quelque chose d’important à lui dire.
« Oh ? Eh bien, moi aussi. Je vais commencer. » Il s’éclaircit la gorge. « Nous devons divorcer. »
